These are our petsimonials from our clients.

PETSIMONIALS (Permission was granted by customers to publish this content on our webpage.) “I have never had a bad experience there. Every single employee cares about their job and the animals and owners that come through the door. I love that people know me and my dogs when I call or walk in. Everyone remembers their names. That is hard to find. I love everyone there!! All of the techs and all of the doctors go above and beyond for their clients. Best veterinary clinic ever! Calling it excellent customer service is an understatement. Thanks for all of your hard work and dedication, it shows in everything you do.” – KATIE B. “I have been taking my pets here since I moved to Roxbury 15 years ago. The doctors and staff are top notch and love your animals as if they were their own. I wouldn’t trust my pets to anyone else!!” – BARBARA O. “Thank you SOOO much Dr. Chris Hallihan for helping our Pudd’in Pop out tonight, getting that darn bone off her jaw! And let me say NO more bones!” – LISA K. “Thanks for taking care of Taner’liq. He’s having a rough night, but hopefully will be on the mend tomorrow!” – TAMMY E. “We will forever be thankful for saving our show chicken, Speckles! !!! The Doctors go over and above to help in anyway they can!!!! We are so lucky to have you in our lives!!!! Thank you so very very much!!!” – SANDRA S. & FAMILY “I cannot thank enough Dr. Casulli for all she did for our Lola during these past months. I also thank Dr. DeSpirito for taking such a good care of my “old man” Bisou and now our “black panther” Sweetpea. You are great!” – SUZANNE B. “My family and I have been coming here for as long as I can remember. Years! The staff is incredible, they care so much and I love having them as a vet. They go above and beyond always. Thank you so much for loving my pets as much as I do. Special shout to Carol, Betty and Bruce. You are amazing.” – JESSICA B. “We have been taking our pets there for about 4 years now and just love the staff at Animal Care Centers!! They take such good care of our cat and dog who are always excited when say ‘let’s go to the vet’, they really treat everyone like family!” – HOLLY T. “Parker is always greeted with big smiles! Thank you for caring for him!” – LAURA R. “We have entrusted the folks at ACC since 2005. From the front office to the vet staff, everyone genuinely cares for our pugs’ well-being and will go the extra distance to help. We can never thank them enough!” – KATIE G.

Join us for a Pawsome time
Author: Gráinne Moran
